name: Ruins of Click [ludum dare 16]
description:
My game for the Ludum Dare 2016 Game Jam

The theme was ancient technology, technology you activate with your own cursor

use the arrow keys to move and navigate the whatever-it-is through the ruins

ludum dare page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-36/?action=preview&uid=112722
